title: Thunderbird constantly crashing (win10)
content:
I have been using Thunderbird for many, many years now and been happy with it.

However last 6 months or so, it has been constantly crashing, often several times a day. Crash reports almost never get sent as it says there is a technical error.

Using a HP Spectre 360 (7 years old) with Windows 10. All windows updates have been applied, and constantly virus checked etc. No other programs giving me grief like Thunderbird which is the most important program. Before Thunderbird I used Eudora which was also great. Always regretted changing to Thunderbird.

I am now over it and Thunderbird. How do I transfer all my emails, attachments etc going back 10-12 years or so to a new email program.

Any suggestions regarding a better email client. Don't want to use Outlook. Have been looking at Proton Mail.
creator: jhnhth75

title: email server provider times out, click again quickly and I get the emails
content: After my Thunderbird auto updated to 128.5.0esr I have trouble getting emails. The server times out, but if I click to retrieve quickly after that I get my emails. Server provider says their logs do not show any problem at their end.

title: Can't send over wifi from Thunderbird
content:
I am running Thunderbird 128.5.0esr (64-bit) on 2 computers: a lenovo T480s and an HP EliteOne 750 Both are running Linux Mint 22. Both use gmail with the same config.(see pic). Comcast is my ISP

Problem If the computers are connected to my router by ethernet cable both can send emails

If I use WiFi neither computer will send. The "send" popup just spins.

I can send gmail from my iphone over the same wifi network

I tried hooking the computers up to a hotspot from my iphone; neither will send

Any ideas?

jod23832944@gmail.com

title: email
content: Firefox/Mozilla/T/Bird: When I open my inbox my emails showup. However when I click on the individual messages some open "normally" and are immediately accessible while others showup with msg notification on a black background with identifying subject but I am unable to open the content of the msg, When I click again it again the screen goes blank and back to mozilla. When I try to "Delete" I have to click on "Inbox" again and all of the unaccessible/unreadable msgs are deleted. Help Thanks Patrick
creator: chickypat

title: Thunderbird has lost all my settings and files.
content:
Dear Mozilla, My 27" iMac crashed suddenly on Wednesday last week (when I wasn't actually using it) and would not boot up. A message referred me to Apple and I made an appointment in Glasgow to take my Mac for the repair. I plugged my Mac in before I left - and it recovered itself!

However all my Thunderbird emails, files and settings have totally disappeared! Apparently a Thunderbird update is responsible. I have spent hours on the phone trying to get help. I have spent hours with CHATDGP talking me through stuff. The data seems to be on my machine but whatever I do I can't get Thunderbird to work. I am at my wits end. I have all my work files in Thunderbird and have no access to anything.

This is the second time recently that my Thunderbird files have vanished. I had to pay an expert to come to my house and restore the first time, but he is very ill at the moment and unable to leave home.

Please help me. I would be very grateful to have my Thunderbird back and working correctly. I am on macOS Monterey, version 12.7.6 (21h1320).

kind regards Helen 07836 707504 UK
creator: Hely

title: Changes in Thunderbird and Spectrum protocols now cause sending errors.  Email cannot be sent out.
content: Email errors started occurring on or about November 25, 2024. Multiple calls and tech support with Spectrum techs and hours of troubleshooting brought about O results. I obtained all necessary protocols for configuring email to Spectrum requirements and for sending and receiving, but I still get outgoing errors. I have been using Thunderbird for 5 years or more now and never had any issues until now. Upon inspection through Thunderbird tools/setting/ looking at "SAVED" passwords, I no longer see "IMAP" or "MAIL" access protocols. It was there previously. I also disabled all my firewall and vpn settings and still cannot send out any emails. I have thoroughly checked out both my personal email setting and my small business email settings and everything as it relates to Spectrum is correct. Spectrum said one thing they found was that the email settings (specifically, would not resolve with the server because of a syncing problem). Spectrum did all they could to resolve on their end, but the issues, as they see it now resides on the Thunderbird side. In an effort to resolve the issues, the Spectrum tech looked and looked for a phone number for Thunderbird and said this is the first time he has never found a number that one can call for some sort of assistance. Emails directly to Thunderbird are very, very slow. And to compound the issue, there are no lists I could find is a repository for error codes and no valuable tech support or specifications could be found that provides any real help for resolution. So now I am making a last ditch effort to contact Thunderbird for a one on one phone conversation that will resolve all the issues I have encountered. Hopefully with your immediate reply, we can resolve these issues and I will be able to help others resolve these same issues. These issues are not just isolated to me. There are literally hundreds maybe even thousands of people out there with the same issues. PLEASE contact me asap. Thank you for your time. (PS. I do receive some messages via email, but sending out is the issue)
creator: la_muse

content:
Buongiorno, sto riscontrando un problema con la mia casella PEC configurata su Thunderbird. Nella colonna dei mittenti, spesso compare un indirizzo email errato, che non ha alcun collegamento con la mail ricevuta. In alcuni casi appare la dicitura "per conto di:" seguita da un indirizzo email che non ha nulla a che vedere con il messaggio in questione.

Questo problema rende difficile identificare correttamente il mittente reale delle email. Ho già verificato la configurazione del mio account e aggiornato Thunderbird all'ultima versione disponibile, ma il problema persiste.

Potreste indicarmi una soluzione per correggere questo comportamento?

content:

Server Replied with 400 If you're seeing this message after snoozing or dismissing a reminder and this is for a calendar you do not want to add or edit events for, you can mark this calendar as read-only to avoid such experience in future. To do so, get to the calendar properties by right-clicking on this calendar in the list in the calendar or task view. ```

I don't want to make my calendar read-only because I'm still gonna use it but I can't remove these annoying pop-ups because of the error. Please help what can I do

title: Thunderbird won't open
content: My thunderbird recently crashed and stopped working (windows version 11 Pro Version 23H2) . The program seemed to freeze and after I got it closed it is not opening back up. I tried closing all of the background processes through the task manager and when I tried to open it again it will open a blank window, list it as not responding, and then close the interface with no ability to do anything beforehand. Tried using the repair option in settings, same response. Tried to reset the app, same result. Tried uninstalling version 128.1 and then installing version 128.5, no errors reported on uninstall or new version install but it still just opens a blank screen, says the program is not responding, and closes the window without anything else appearing. I tried restarting the computer (soft and hard restart) and get the same response. I need to be able to use my inbox manager or I need to move to another program. Thanks.

title: kan geen mail verzenden
content: Beste, zonder zichtbare aanleiding kon ik plots geen mail meer verzenden en kreeg steeds dezelfde melding. enkel de voornaam in het antwoord van de server is steeds anders. het gekke is dat deze voornamen voorkomen in mijn lijst van telenet. En dan staat er: you have temporarily been blacklisted. ik weet hier geen raad meer mee. met dank bij voorbaat, Gust Ischen [******]@telenet.be
creator: gust.ischen

title: importing profile thunderbird fails
content:
I switched to another mailing provider and before this I made an export of the mailbox. The Imap account was deleted at the provide, so my mailbox is lost. Now I tried to import the mailbox again, but the import fails.

I tried the import manager, but every time after import only empty local map are left. After this I tried the different options (profile of files), both gives the same results, showing an empty map. Then I tried the addon ImportExportTools NG 14.1.2. During the import TB shuts down. When TB starts after the import, for about 10 secs it shows the mailbox with the imported mails. Then unfortunaly all the email dissapears. Could anyone help me with this issue?

Thanks!
creator: ergobouw3113

title: Sending of message failed to uscg.mil
content: I was able to send emails to all of my contacts until a week ago when two contacts at USCG.mil have been rejected. I have reset the computer, manually loaded the addresses, tested other address and everything appears fine, but not to them. Any suggestions?

title: Authorization
content:
Manu Andino (Mozilla Support)

Dec 2, 2024, 15:40 CST

Thanks for answering all of my questions, Andrew!

As shared in my previous reply, we are only suited to assist with concerns specifically related to Mozilla accounts and subscription services like Mozilla VPN, Relay, Monitor, and others. Your question appears to be related to another product, such as Thunderbird. To get community support, you'll need to continue signing into the forum by following this link: https://support.mozilla.org/questions/new/thunderbird/form and then clicking the blue "Continue" button. This will allow you to sign in to your Mozilla account which is used to ask the question on the forum.

If you cannot sign into your Mozilla account, let us know and we can help you with that.

We're so sorry for the added inconvenience. We are working to correct this, but sincerely appreciate your patience! Mozilla Support Team Privacy ∙ Legal


Andyheritageable kadak

Nov 30, 2024, 08:20 CST

Dear Manu,

I am trying to add an email account to my mozilla (thunderbird) email accounts - I currently have several already but need to add another one. These accounts are not mozilla accounts but typically outlook, for example. In this case the steps I take are:

To add an email account I go to account settings and "add email account"

Then it takes me to set up your existing email address where I enter the account I want added: for this case I enter the email address and password:

akadak@esmci.com

It then takes me to the MCI web site where I have to enter the password again

After which it then says approval required - see this print screen shot.


After I request approval - it sends me this



Then nothing happens - I don't know where it goes. I contacted the company and they don't know either.

This is the problem.

Andrew Kadak



Manu Andino (Mozilla Support)

Nov 29, 2024, 12:09 CST

Hi there,

Thanks for your email!

You've reached the Mozilla Support team, where we primarily assist with restoring access to Mozilla accounts and subscription services like Mozilla VPN, Relay, Monitor, and others.

I'd like to start by asking a few questions to learn more about the difficulties you're experiencing:

Is the account you want to set up a Mozilla account? Do you want to create one or sign in to one? What is the OS version of the device you are using and what is the version of the program or app that you are using when you experience this? Can you provide a step-by-step description of the process you follow when this happens? Can you share a screenshot, or preferably a screen recording, where we can see the error you are encountering? If you'd like to send us a screen recording, you can learn how to do that here: "How to record your screen on any device"

Each of your answers is crucial to providing you with the proper assistance, so please don't disregard any of the above inquiries.

I look forward to hearing from you! Mozilla Support Team Privacy ∙ Legal
